p: The extracts of P. linearis demonstrated anti-AChE activity ranged between 9.2% and 67.2% at 10 mg/mL concentrations. The best inhibitory activity was obtained for DE extract of P. linearis (67.2%) and followed with methanol (44.7%) and hexane (42.8%) extracts. The ethyl acetate extract demonstrated poor inhibitory activity (9.2%).
